actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Relocation Assistance and Real Property Acquisition Policies Act of 1970 to extend for 3 years the provision for full Federal payment of relocation and related costs for victims of Hurricane Agnes and of certain other major disasters.

summary.text: Extends for three years (until July 1, 1975) the provisions under the Uniform Relocation Assistance and Real Property Acquisition Policies Act of 1970, according full Federal payment of relocation and related costs for victims of Hurricane Agnes and other major disasters occuring between January 1, 1971, and July 1, 1973. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 4527)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Relocation Assistance and Real Property Acquisition Policies Act of 1970 to extend for 3 years the provision for full Federal payment of relocation and related costs for victims of Hurricane Agnes and of certain other major disasters.
